select
from t_role_user tru left join t_console_user tcu on tru.user_id = tcu.id left join t_console_role tcr on tru.role_id = tcr.id left join t_role_competence trc on trc.role_id = tcr.id left join t_console_competence tcc on trc.competence_id = tcc.id left join t_console_menu menu on menu.id = tcc.menu_id where tcu.id = #{userId} and tru.deleted != true and tcu.deleted != true and tcr.deleted != true and trc.deleted != true and tcc.deleted != true and menu.deleted != true
and menu.name like concat('%', #{search.name}, '%')
and menu.icon like concat('%', #{icon}, '%')
and menu.path like concat('%', #{path}, '%')
order by menu.weights;
